Displays.Description:
A cluster bullet sprite shooter with lots of customization options. A summary of each extra byte is included here, but check the documentation for more detailed descriptions and examples.
Extra Bit: Aim at player if set.
Extra Byte 1: Shooter type.
Extra Byte 2: Rate at which bullets are shot.
Extra Byte 3: Speed at which bullets are shot.
Extra Byte 4: Angle of shot (irrelevant if aiming).
Extra Byte 5: Offset from global timer.
Extra Byte 6: Parameter, ASM file has details.
Extra Byte 7: Time for bullet to stay on screen.
Extra Byte 8: How many bullets can be shot.
Extra Byte 9: Sprite number to attach to.
Extra Byte 10: Y/X offset from host sprite.
Extra Byte 11: Various usage.
Extra Byte 12: Various usage.
